version_description:
1.5.1
Improved point light performance
Updated terrain textures
Fixed water specular and color options
iPhone 11 defaults to simple trees
1.5
Animal shape changes: Boar, Horse, Fox, Foxil, Wolf, Deer, Bear
Emotes: Animations, facial expressions, poses, runs
Updated environment
Character updates
Time slow option
Hundreds of small updates and bug fixes
Added support for new iPads / iPhones
Fast Travel map
